text: N’umuvyeyi wawe yaciye urubanza rwuko mutazosenga uwariwe wese atari Imana yonyene gusa, hamwe nukugirira ineza ntangere abavyeyi bose uko ari babiri, hanyuma umwe muribo ageze muzabukuru muri kumwe nabo, canke bose uko ari babiri, rero ntubabwire ijambo rivuga riti:- Ah! kandi ntuba kankamire, kandi ubavugishe imvugo y’urupfasoni rwiza
